name: Recollection (lmao_leoaf)
description:
A doctor guides you through your past. You, the player, must collect visual and auditory pieces in order to recapture a moment in your life. After the completion of each memory, a new path is unlocked and a new piece of the story is revealed. Collect all the memories and find out who you really are. 

Credits:

Chris Allison - Sound Design, Audio implementation and Voice Acting ;

Leo Afonso - Lead Writer and Producer ;

Loren Heubert-Aubry - Programmer and Mechanics Design ;

Sarah McGee - Animation, Background Artist, Character Design and Story Editor; 

Special thanks to Rachel Boggess for Voice Acting
